title: Hardcastle's Obsession
description: The new mystery featuring Detective Inspector Hardcastle in this popular First World War series   - September 1916. A Zeppelin with a deadly payload is aimed at Victoria station, but when the bombs miss their mark and instead destroy a nearby house in Washbourne Street, mystery ensues for DI Hardcastle. The body of a woman is discovered, who was not only unknown to the tenants of the building but also appears to have died before the bombs were even dropped…
author: Graham Ison
